Package Model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Board
    Board holds the community cards that are dealt to the table and can be viewed by all players.
    Card
    A Card object that has a suit and a numerical value.
    CareTaker
    Keeps a list of mementos that can be used to revert back to earlier states in the game.
    Dealer
    The Dealer class has a deck from which it deals cards to the players and to the board.
    Deck
    The Deck class hold a stockpile of cards from which the players personal cards and the board cards can be dealt.
    Game
    The Game class holds the objects that determine the state of the game/
    Hand
    The Hand class holds the cards that the player chooses from the board and from their personal cards at the end of the game.
    Memento
    Holds a game state.
    Originator
    The Originator class has the current state of the game and can save the state.
    Player
    The Player class represents a player of the game.
    PlayerList
    The PlayerList class tracks the players currently in the game.
    Pot
    Holds the value of the current value of the pot.
    RoundOfPlay
    Tracks the current round in the game.
